The '''Book of Clouds''' contains spells that cover the dungeon in dangerous clouds.

==History==
*[[0.27]] Replaced by [[Book of Vapours]].
*[[0.20]] [[Poisonous Cloud]] was replaced by [[Poisonous Vapours]].
*[[0.12]] [[Evaporate]] and [[Tornado]] were removed, and [[Ring of Flames]] was added.
